data.name: ZRV0001Title
data.value: Missing Debug Display, should include data from members

data.name: ZRV0001Description
data.value: Classes with in model namespaces should have a DebugDisplay

data.name: ZRV0001MessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' should have a DebugDisplay

data.name: ZRV0001CodeAction
data.value: Add Blank Debug Display

data.name: ZRV0002DescriptionEmpty
data.value: Debug Displays cannot be empty

data.name: ZRV0002DescriptionBadInterpolation
data.value: Debug Displays should include data from members to provide useful information while debugging

data.name: ZRV0002MessageFormat
data.value: Debug Display argument is invalid

data.name: ZRV0002Title
data.value: Debug Display value is invalid

data.name: ZRV0003Title
data.value: Optional property should be expressed as simple property Expressions

data.name: ZRV0003Description
data.value: Optional properties cannot be created with complex expressions such as `card => card.Checklist.First().Checks` instead add the Checklist property seperately

data.name: ZRV0003MessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' is an invalid expression, must use a simple non invoked expression to create an optional property

data.name: ZRV0004
data.value: Expression does not contain any properties with OptionalPropertyAttribute and should be removed

data.name: ZRV0005
data.value: Trailing Properties on extression do not contain any properties with OptionalPropertyAttribute and should be removed

data.name: ZRV0006Title
data.value: Inconsistent Naming

data.name: ZRV0006MessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' objects should not cointain '{1}' in their name

data.name: ZRV0006Description
data.value: Variable names should follow set naming conventions based on their class type.

data.name: ZRV0007Title
data.value: Cannot use optional properties in DebugDisplay

data.name: ZRV0007MessageFormat
data.value: '{0}' should not be used in DebugDisplay as it is optional

data.name: ZRV0008Title
data.value: Use 'is' pattern for null checks

data.name: ZRV0008MessageFormat
data.value: Consider using 'is null' or 'is not null' instead of '==' or '!=' for null checks
